attributes.action: Reduce the costs of Child UK Pasports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it proportional more expensive in the UK for a child's passport that an adult passport.  It must get rather expensive for some families.

In the UK Child £49 for 5 years while adult £77 for 10 years.

In Ireland Child £23 for 5 years, Adult £70 for 10 years

Ireland seems to have a much more friendly approach to passport costs for children.
